attributes.action: No vaccine pass for entering indoor public places.
attributes.background: With the vaccine being rolled out, it should be a personal choice whether to have the vaccine or not. To be turned away from a job or a resteraunt just because you choose not to have this vaccine is discrimination and a restriction on our freedom.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Outlaw discrimination against those who do not get a Covid-19 vaccination
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/575801
